blogPost.excerpt: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a business’s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
blogPost.body: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a business’s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
blogPost.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours
blogPost.author: Alexandra Velasquez

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小时内提供在线评估，衡量企业网站维护消费者数据保护法的程度，评估隐私功能，并突出网站的潜在差距和问题。
localize.tagline: 在24小时内分析网站的隐私和合规性

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小時內提供在線評估，衡量企業網站維護消費者數據保護法的程度，評估隱私功能，並突出網站的潛在差距和問題。
localize.tagline: 在24小時內分析網站的隱私和合規性

previous.excerpt: 'Save the World' is a game for 3 or more people where players compete, collaborate and everything in between to save the world. The goal of the game is for everyone to agree on a solution to a randomly chosen disaster, like an asteroid strike.
previous.title: Save The World - The card game for humanity

localize.description: “拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的游戏，玩家们为了拯救世界而相互竞争、协作。这个游戏的目标是让每个人就随机选择的灾难的解决方案达成一致，比如小行星撞击。
“拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的遊戲，玩家們爲了拯救世界而相互競爭、協作。這個遊戲的目標是讓每個人就隨機選擇的災難的解決方案達成一致，比如小行星撞擊。

next.excerpt: Introducing Accountable 2.0 - the all new way to become HIPAA compliant. Designed to simplify the entire process of achieving and managing HIPAA compliance, from HIPAA training to policy management. And did we mention $100k HIPAA breach guarantee?
next.title: Accountable 2.0 - HIPAA compliance management platform and $100k guarantee

localize.description: 引入负责任的2.0-成为HIPAA兼容的全新方式。旨在简化实现和管理HIPAA合规性的整个流程，从HIPAA培训到策略管理。我们有没有提到10万美元的HIPAA违约担保？
localize.tagline: HIPAA合规管理平台和10万美元担保

localize.description: 引入負責任的2.0-成爲HIPAA兼容的全新方式。旨在簡化實現和管理HIPAA合規性的整個流程，從HIPAA培訓到策略管理。我們有沒有提到10萬美元的HIPAA違約擔保？
localize.tagline: HIPAA合規管理平臺和10萬美元擔保
